title: to the slum dwellers located on land belonging to Government or Public Authority within a distance of 2 km
clause_text: to the slum dwellers located on land belonging to Government or Public Authority within a distance of 2 km. from the land on which the Project is undertaken, or

source_pdf.text_snippet: to the slum dwellers located on land belonging to Government or Public Authority within a distance of 2 km. from the land on which the Project is undertaken, or
